cleaned_text: - Melissa Zappa, MAcOM, LAc, holds a Master of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine from Oregon College of Oriental Medicine in Portland, Oregon and a Bachelor's degree in Biomedical Sciences from the National University of Health Sciences near Chicago, IL. Melissa completed post-graduate internships in Nanjing, China at Jiangsu Provincial Hospital and has pursued additional integrative and oncology training from Memorial Sloan Kettering and American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO.) Her treatment specialties include gastrointestinal (nausea, digestive upset, abdominal pain, constipation, diarrhea, etc) and hormonal disturbances (hot flashes, night sweats) due to cancer and its treatment.
